name: The Sacred Garden Demo
description:
WARNING! This is just a demo, all the assets are placeholders and will be changed in the future!

The Sacred Garden

You play as a child named Lily, her village has a rite of passage she must complete now that she has come of age. In the forest she founds an ancient spirit who was sealed many years ago and decides to help them.

Gameplay: 

Use WASD or the arrows on your keyboard to walk, and hold SHIFT to run. You can also interact with your surroundings by pressing Z.

Credits:

All credits for the assets used goes to RPG maker 2003, I also wanted to thank my friends who helped me with playtesting and translating (I'm not fluent in english).

This demo was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022

I will keep working on the project even after the jam ends. Please report any issues you may find in the comments such as bugs, glitches or if you're having any major problem with the game in general. I will try my best to help! 

Thank you for playing!
